title: Steps how to reply to the letter of claims
abstract: The writer would like to thank his parents for their financial and mental support during his study at Petra Business English, Petra Christian University, Surabaya. He also expresses his gratitude to Mr SUTJIANTO KUSUMA here as Owner and Director of PT. AVILA PRIMA, located at Jl. Margorejo Indah III B 709, Surabaya, gave permission and guided him during his internship there. Furthermore, he presents his gratitude to all of the teachers of PETRA BUSINESS ENGLISH, especially to Ms Setyawati, who plays a vital role in the writer's success. Last but not least, the writer would say thank you to all of his friends who gave warmth and close friendship during his study at PETRA BUSINESS ENGLISH.
